subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Jets Coach Eric Mangini will serve as a coaching program adviser and spokesman for USA Football, the sport’s national governing body at the youth, high school and international amateur levels. Mangini, 36, will work with the group’s coaching program and offer online coaching courses.
